protocol_name: PFA fixation and Percoll prep of sediments
protocol_name_html: PFA fixation and Percoll prep of sediments
description: Protocol for PFA fixation of sediment or culture samples and Percoll prep of sediments.

materials.reagent_name: 2 mM Ca2 /5 mM K /7 mM glutamate solution

status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"2thtj","text":"Heat 33 mL MQ water to 60\u00b0C in a 50 mL Falcon style tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3qkmu","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"2728","amount":"33","unit":"2","label":"Milli-Q water","guid":"B3507E5F1A3E47818747DD4DC3DF861D"}}]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8590n","text":"Transfer ~0.1 g of wet sediment, crushed carbonate, or 0.5 to 1 ml of a culture to a 2 ml centrifuge tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dp55m","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
steps.section: Fixing sediment or culture samples (lab based)

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"468kd","text":"Add 0.5 of sediment to a 2 ml screw top tube,","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5hms7","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d9fqt","text":"For 200 \u03bcl of sediment slurry, add 600 \u03bcl 1M TE buffer (1M Tris-HCl, 0.1M EDTA, pH 8.0) and 100 \u03bcl 100 \u03bcM pyrophosphate to a 2 ml tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5nc27","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fffah","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"1kp1d","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"2737","amount":"600","unit":"1","label":"1M TE buffer (1M Tris-HCl, 0.1M EDTA, pH 8.0)","guid":"735F161FEB3243C9BA597998653A7CA7"}},{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"2739","amount":"100","unit":"1","label":"100 \u03bcM pyrophosphate","guid":"FC0B788A1FCD44D488BBC059334FA5F8"}}]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"egg5h","text":"In the fume hood, add 2 g paraformaldehyde powder (MW 90.1) and a few drops of 2 N NaOH (1-4).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5oe30","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bovn7","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"2729","amount":"2","unit":"6","label":"paraformaldehyde powder (MW 90.1)","guid":"C580DFD8B04F4CA1A55FB2F20042515F"}}]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"crbtk","text":"Close and mix by gently shaking tube to dissolve. Add an additional drop of 2 N NaOH if this takes more than 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5a6vr","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"42mfv","text":"Add 15 ml 10X PBS to bring to\u00a0yield\u00a04% PFA in 3X PBS (best for seawater samples), or 5 ml 10X PBS to\u00a0yield\u00a04% PFA in 1X PBS (best for freshwater samples).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"djomj","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dm4tp","text":"Cool solution to room temperature and bring the final volume to 50 mL with MQ water.\u00a0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cgubf","text":"Sterilize through a 0.2 \u03bcm\u00a0syringer\u00a0filter, and the store in 2-5 ml aliquots at -20\u00b0.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"amhss","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"esjrs","text":"Some precipitate will likely be observed as the aliquots thaw. Place them in a beaker of room temperature water and give 10-15 minutes, and invert tubes to fully resuspend the solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4851f","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"10137","duration":"900","label":"room temperature water","guid":"CCEE487EA67745BAA6434CC966056C77"}}]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7rav0","text":"Centrifgue at 10000g for 2 min to pellet sample and decant the liquid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9uqif","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f1eel","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ae1ih","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"10138","duration":"120","label":"Centrifugation at 10000g","guid":"B118EA1AF31448EBA4F2658BA1ADC32C"}}]}
steps.section: Fixing sediment or culture samples (lab based)

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"7mkb4","text":"If the sample was taken from a stable isotope incubation, before fixation wash three times with PBS by resuspending and centrifuging to pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f0a9p","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
steps.section: Fixing sediment or culture samples (lab based)

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"j072","text":"Fully resuspend sample in 250 \u03bcl 3X PBS. (Use an alternate PBS concentration if desired).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1t1ej","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9io4n","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"2732","amount":"250","unit":"1","label":"3X PBS","guid":"2D467A0824B14DEAA15955450BEC935B"}}]}
steps.section: Fixing sediment or culture samples (lab based)

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"2afe5","text":"Add 750 \u03bcl 4% PFA, invert tube to mix, and then incubate at 4\u00b0C for 1-3h.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7ln1q","text":"(Alternatively, resuspend sample in 500 \u03bcl 3X PBS, add 500 \u03bcl 4% PFA and incubate at 4\u00b0C overnight.)\u00a0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9kufl","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cn965","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"4lkds","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"2735","amount":"750","unit":"1","label":"4% PFA","guid":"312572B50DBC4754BFD18364FA7D82D9"}},{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"10139","duration":"10800","label":"Incubation at 4\u00b0C","guid":"961BB69CDA6C45028243DACB9F90F9A2"}}]}
steps.section: Fixing sediment or culture samples (lab based)

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"8g6c1","text":"Centrifuge at 10000-16000g for 3 min to pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2ac5h","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dbgcq","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"10140","duration":"180","label":"Centrifugation at 10000-16000g","guid":"AFCCCF7941DE48D68D9B8A23A69292FB"}}]}
steps.section: Fixing sediment or culture samples (lab based)

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"4hgnv","text":"Decant the supernatant, and wash by fully resuspending the sediment in any volume of 3X PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3roah","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
steps.section: Fixing sediment or culture samples (lab based)

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"4ijnp","text":"Centrifuge at 10000-160000g for 3 min to\u00a0pellet, and decant the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"83gbm","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3jl54","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"10144","duration":"180","label":"Centrifugatio at 10000-16000g","guid":"ADA67C9A187742AFA8CDD6ACFB15D26B"}}]}
steps.section: Fixing sediment or culture samples (lab based)

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"595o7","text":"Resuspend in 1:1 3X PBS and 100% ethanol. Add PBS first, then add a complementary volume of ethanol and mix well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
steps.section: Fixing sediment or culture samples (lab based)

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"fuokf","text":"Store samples indefinitely at -20 \u00b0C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
steps.section: Fixing sediment or culture samples (lab based)

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"dnfsq","text":"Bring the volume to 1 ml with 3X PBS. Invert to suspend sediment in a slurry.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1ee29","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4djl0","text":"Add 1 ml of 4% PFA and invert to mix well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1rq8e","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ehgmv","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"2736","amount":"1","unit":"2","label":"4% PFA","guid":"F11C3BAD0454401EBC4D2643B7083356"}}]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c3avg","text":"Incubate at 4\u00b0C for 12 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6t666","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2mg3j","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"10147","duration":"43200","label":"Incubation at 4\u00b0C","guid":"0D05374A72F947EC932DB586844FB814"}}]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"783rf","text":"Centrifuge at 10000g for 2 min to pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7as68","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"aghoi","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"10148","duration":"120","label":"Centrifugation at 10000g","guid":"D4F56CBC03F74DBE9E3621743F6F5A2F"}}]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eifii","text":"Decant the supernatant, and wash by fully resuspending the sediment in any volume of 3X PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7u6jq","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e5vps","text":"Centrifuge at 10000g for 3 min to\u00a0pellet, and decant the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9k4la","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3b1h5","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"10149","duration":"180","label":"Centrifugation at 10000g","guid":"FA74FC72A9E9489281711EA27444F483"}}]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6panl","text":"Resuspend in 1:1 3X PBS and 100% ethanol. Add PBS first, then add a complementary volume of ethanol and mix well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e8fpr","text":"Store samples indefinitely at -20 \u00b0C.\u00a0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dontr","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"notes","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":"

If a -20 \u00b0C is not available, store at 4 \u00b0C until returning to the lab.<\/p>"}]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"p9tj","text":"Heat the mixture in the hybridization microwave (or heat block) at 60\u00b0C for 3 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"aodt2","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"10150","duration":"180","label":"microwave (or heat block) at 60\u00b0C","guid":"439AE2590D5E4D539772684526A16E99"}}]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"80ju5","text":"Allow the tubes to cool on ice, and then\u00a0sonicate\u00a0on ice for 10 sec at\u00a0power\u00a0setting 3 (Branson Sonifier 150 with serial#C4333 wand style probe). (1\/3)\u00a0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6g2km","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9m955","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"10151","duration":"10","label":"Sonicate on ice","guid":"B740558755C44B9FBCE433720C11C737"}}]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f237a","text":"Add, ~1 ml\u00a0percoll\u00a0(filter sterilized with a 0.2 \u03bcm syringe filter) to the bottom of the sediment slurry with a pipette or needle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2k6gl","text":"Centrifuge at maximum speed (~16,000g) for 20 min at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dc91v","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"cecv1","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"10154","duration":"1200","label":"Centrifugation at ~16,000g","guid":"36D91A9029AB4C419164AC5CF217935B"}},{"type":"notes","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":"
After 20 min, the mixture will be separated by density, with
the sediment in a pellet at the bottom and two distinct liquid layers. The bottom layer is primarily percoll and the top is primarily
TE/PBS/ethanol. At the interface, expect to see a brown, “fluffy” band of organic material including single cells and aggregates.
"}]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"er0sq","text":"Remove the upper layer and the organic material, transferring to a new tube and leaving as much of the\u00a0percoll\u00a0behind as possible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"53dle","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7vcmd","text":"Concentrate the cell layer by centrifuging at maximum speed for 3 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"78u8q","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"10155","duration":"180","label":"Centrifugation at maximum speed","guid":"5CA4B4F6C0454A228519115EC61A1DA5"}}]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dtdpv","text":"Sonicate\u00a0on ice for 10 sec at\u00a0power\u00a0setting 3 (Branson Sonifier 150 with serial#C4333 wand style probe). (2\/3)\u00a0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fnfpk","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"10152","duration":"10","label":"Sonicate on ice","guid":"D93925EF297F4E279579F21BA6FB1201"}}]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"76v8a","text":"Sonicate\u00a0on ice for 10 sec at\u00a0power\u00a0setting 3 (Branson Sonifier 150 with serial#C4333 wand style probe). (3\/3)\u00a0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4i6r2","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"10153","duration":"10","label":"Sonicate on ice","guid":"BD41DBB9B5004934BFA73479E55420A5"}}]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6gme3","text":"Remove the supernatant and resuspend in an appropriate volume of 1:1 3X PBS:100% Ethanol. Depending upon cell density 100-300 \u03bcl.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8vsgm","text":"The mixture can now be stored at -20\u00b0C for subsequent FISH hybridization after spotting on slides or filter preparation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
